scenes.background: You decide to multitask. [Monica] reviews the presentation draft.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'The draft looks fine, but can you double-check the data while working on the report?'

options.text: Sure, I can manage both. Just give me a bit more time.
options.analysis: You demonstrate good social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation might take a hit due to the added workload.

options.text: I think checking the data should be your focus while I finish the report.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation but might appear less empathetic and less perceptive of the overall task needs.

options.text: Maybe we can split the tasks more evenly. I'll handle the report if you take care of the data.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy, but your motivation and self-regulation might suffer due to the unexpected task distribution.
